description: Jane has been working as a Social Media Coordinator at Pug Media Co. for 3 years now. She quickly became an integral part of the team. In her free time, Jane enjoys trying out new brunch spots and going for walks with her dog, Dog.

Since joining the team 4 years ago, John has quickly laddered into the role of Social Media Analyst. His efforts have helped the company's SEO tremendously by streamlining efficency and helping optimize the usage of the internet. Outside of work, John is an avid tennis player and a huge fan of Serena Williams.

Wendy has been with the Pug Media Co. since its inception. She plays an integral role in ensuring that all office operations and administration are working smoothly. In her free time, Wendy enjoys going to different coffee shops and catching up on reading.
